name: Penguin Vs Slimes
description:
This game was made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2020 with the theme cold. It was developed over the course of two weeks with Godot game engine.

A penguin alone decends into a ice cave full of slimes... will he defeat their leader?

Controls:

  • Directions -> Move & Jump
  • Space -> Attack
  • Esc -> Pause

Credits:

Graphics & Development by me.

Music & Sfx from:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
  • https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style
